Package ru.nsu.gstubarev.graph

Class AdjacencyListGraph<V>

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.gstubarev.graph.AdjacencyListGraph<V>
Type Parameters:
V - the type of vertices in the graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph<V>
public class AdjacencyListGraph<V> extends Object implements Graph<V>
Graph implementation using adjacency list representation.
